comment.author: 41399322@N07
comment._content:
At the left, the "Academia de dibujo y pintura" building, drawing and painting academy.
Those buildings still exists on the colonial cities, at yucatan, like Merida, Tizimin, Valladolid, etc.
The government started a special conservation program some years ago to guarantee the survival of the colonial buildings, and thanks to that program, we still can enjoy those cities with their original look, like the time got stopped in the XVII century
